definitions.definition: One who survives , especially one who survives a traumatic experience.
examples: From this moment on, I choose to live not as a victim, but as a survivor.

definitions.definition: A person who is able to endure hardship .
One who knew a specific decedent .
examples: She was from a large family and had many friends, so the funeral was crowded with mourning survivors .

main_definition: One who survives , especially one who survives a traumatic experience.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A person who is able to endure hardship .
One who knew a specific decedent .
